heading: Today
text: Occasional light snow or snow showers, with some valley rain, tapering off west to east.  Totals 3 to 6 inches in NY, up to 8 in the St. Lawrence, 1 to 4 inches from the Champlain Valley east, and an inch or less southeast VT and southern NH.  Some afternoon clearing in southern valleys. Colder.  Highs in the 20s in NY, some teens in the St. Lawrence, and 30s from the Champlain Valley east, falling late.  Winds south, becoming west through NY and western VT 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Scattered snow showers retreating to the mountains.  Partly cloudy southeast, then clearing southwest late.  Turning much colder.  Lows from zero to 10 above north, and 5 to 15 south.  Winds west 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph.

heading: Friday
text: Morning clouds giving way to sunshine from south to north.  Cold.  Highs in the upper teens to low 20s north, in the 20s south.  West winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph from the Green Mountains east, decreasing in the afternoon.
